sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.MENU_CODE, IF(#language#= 'en', T.MENU_EN_INTRO, T.MENU_INTRO) MENU_INTRO FROM SY_MENU T WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1
T.MENU_PARENT_CODE = #MENU_PARENT_CODE#
T.DEPTH = #DEPTH#
T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#

SELECT T.CODE_ID DATA_TYPE_CODE, IF(#language#= 'en', T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) DATA_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1
T.PARENT_CODE = #PARENT_CODE#
T.DEPTH = #DEPTH#
T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT POST_GROUP_ID POST_GROUP_ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' then POST_GROUP_EN_NAME ELSE POST_GROUP_NAME END) AS POST_GROUP_NAME FROM HR_POST_GROUP WHERE ACTIVITY = 1
T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
ORDER BY POST_GROUP_ID

SELECT POST_COLUMN_ID POST_COLUMN_ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' then POST_COLUMN_EN_NAME ELSE POST_COLUMN_NAME END) AS POST_COLUMN_NAME FROM HR_POST_COLUMN WHERE ACTIVITY = 1
T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
T.POST_GROUP_ID = #POST_GROUP_ID#
ORDER BY NLSSORT(IF(#language#= 'en', POST_COLUMN_EN_NAME, POST_COLUMN_NAME), 'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')

SELECT POST_GRADE_ID POST_GRADE_ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' then POST_GRADE_EN_NAME ELSE POST_GRADE_NAME END) AS POST_GRADE_NAME FROM HR_POST_GRADE WHERE ACTIVITY = 1
T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
T.POST_GROUP_ID = #POST_GROUP_ID#
T.POST_COLUMN_ID = #POST_COLUMN_ID#
ORDER BY NLSSORT(IF(#language#= 'en', POST_GRADE_EN_NAME, POST_GRADE_NAME), 'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')

SELECT POST_ID POST_ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' then POST_EN_NAME ELSE POST_NAME END) AS POST_NAME FROM HR_POST WHERE ACTIVITY = 1
T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
T.POST_GROUP_ID = #POST_GROUP_ID#
T.POST_COLUMN_ID = #POST_COLUMN_ID#
T.POST_GRADE_ID = #POST_GRADE_ID#
ORDER BY NLSSORT(IF(#language#='en', POST_EN_NAME, POST_NAME), 'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')

SELECT POSITION_ID POSITION_ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' then POSITION_EN_NAME ELSE POSITION_NAME END) AS POSITION_NAME FROM HR_POSITION WHERE ACTIVITY = 1
T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
T.POST_GROUP_ID = #POST_GROUP_ID#
T.POST_COLUMN_ID = #POST_COLUMN_ID#
T.POST_GRADE_ID = #POST_GRADE_ID#
T.POST_ID = #POST_ID#
ORDER BY NLSSORT(IF(#language#='en', POSITION_EN_NAME, POSITION_NAME), 'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')

SELECT '1' STATUS_ID, IF(#language#='en', 'Available', '可用') STATUS, 'Available' EN_STATUS FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '0' STATUS_ID, IF(#language#='en', 'Unavailable', '不可用') STATUS, 'Unavailable' EN_STATUS FROM DUAL
SELECT T.CPNY_ID CPNY_ID, IF(#language#= 'en', T.CPNY_EN_NAME, T.CPNY_NAME) CPNY_NAME, T.CPNY_EN_NAME EN_CPNY_NAME FROM HR_COMPANY T WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS LEAVE_TYPE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS LEAVE_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'LeaveTypeCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS EV_TYPE_ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS EV_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'EVTYPE' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS EV_PROCESS_ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS EV_PROCESS_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'EVPROCESS' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS EV_OPERATE_ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS EV_OPERATE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'EVOPERATE' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS EV_ITEM_ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS EV_ITEM_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'EVITEM' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS OT_TYPE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS OT_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'OTTypeCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.TYPE_ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.TYPE_EN_NAME, T.TYPE_NAME) ELSE T.TYPE_EN_NAME END) AS TYPE_NAME FROM PA_BONUS_TYPE T WHERE T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS EXP_TYPE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS EXP_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'ExpDetailTypeCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT PRO_ID,concat('[',PRO_ID,'] ',PRO_NAME) PRO_NAME, PRO_EN_NAME, TYPE_CODE FROM ( SELECT T.PRO_NO AS PRO_ID, If(#language# = 'en',IFNULL(T.PRO_EN_NAME, T.PRO_NAME),T.PRO_NAME) PRO_NAME, T.PRO_EN_NAME , T.TYPE_CODE FROM ESS_PROJECT T WHERE T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 and
T.END_DATE>= str_to_date(#WORK_DATE#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND T.START_DATE <= str_to_date(#WORK_DATE#,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND T.PRO_NO IN(SELECT EPE.PRO_NO FROM ESS_PROJECT_EMP EPE WHERE EPE.EMPID=#EMPID#) AND T.TYPE_CODE = #TYPE_CODE#
) as bb

SELECT T.BT_NO, TO_CHAR(T.BT_FROM_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')||' ~ '|| TO_CHAR(T.BT_TO_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS BT_NAME FROM ESS_APPLY_BT T WHERE T.EMPID = #EMPID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 0 ORDER BY T.BT_FROM_TIME DESC

SELECT T.ITEM_NO ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.ITEM_EN_NAME, T.ITEM_NAME) ELSE T.ITEM_NAME END) AS NAME
FROM AR_ITEM T WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
T.ITEM_NO IN ('1','8','38','39')
ORDER BY T.ITEM_NO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS RESIGN_TYPE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS RESIGN_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'ResignTypeCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS DIS_TYPE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS DIS_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'DispatchDivision' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS REWARD_TYPE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS REWARD_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'RewardTypeCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS BANK_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS BANK_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'BankCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS TYPE_CODE, IF( #language# = 'en',IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME),T.CODE_NAME) TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'projectTypeCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1
T.CODE_ID IN (SELECT EP.TYPE_CODE FROM ESS_PROJECT EP, ESS_PROJECT_EMP EPE WHERE EP.PRO_NO = EPE.PRO_NO AND EPE.EMPID = #EMPID#
EP.END_DATE >= str_to_date('2013-04-01','%Y-%m-%d')
)
ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.EV_PERIOD_ID AS EV_PERIOD_ID, T.EV_PERIOD_ID AS ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.EV_PERIOD_EN_NAME, T.EV_PERIOD_NAME) ELSE T.EV_PERIOD_NAME END) AS EV_PERIOD_NAME, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.EV_PERIOD_EN_NAME, T.EV_PERIOD_NAME) ELSE T.EV_PERIOD_NAME END) AS NAME FROM EVA_PERIOD T WHERE T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.EV_YEAR,T.EV_PERIOD_ID

SELECT EVAPT.EV_PERIOD_ID, EVAPT.EV_TYPE_ID AS EV_TYPE_ID, EVAPT.EV_TYPE_ID AS ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(A.CODE_EN_NAME, A.CODE_NAME) ELSE A.CODE_NAME END) AS EV_TYPE_NAME, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(A.CODE_EN_NAME, A.CODE_NAME) ELSE A.CODE_NAME END) AS NAME FROM EVA_PERIOD_TYPE EVAPT,EVA_PERIOD EVAP, SY_CODE A WHERE EVAPT.EV_PERIOD_ID = EVAP.EV_PERIOD_ID AND EVAPT.EV_TYPE_ID = A.CODE_ID(+) AND EVAPT.ACTIVITY = 1 AND EVAP.ACTIVITY = 1 AND EVAP.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
EVAPT.EV_PERIOD_ID = #EV_PERIOD_ID#
ORDER BY A.ORDERNO,A.CODE_ID

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS REASON_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS REASON_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'reasonCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS REWARD_GRADE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS REWARD_GRADE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'RewardGradeCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS PUNISHMENT_TYPE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS PUNISHMENT_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'TransPunishment' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS TAX_WAY_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS TAX_WAY_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'taxWayCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS BIZ_ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS BIZ_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'HrBiz' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS STATUS_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS STATUS_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'EmpStatus' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1
T.CODE_ID IN ('EmpStatus1','EmpStatus2','EmpStatus6')
ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS FAM_TYPE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS FAM_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'OtherRelation' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS FAM_TYPE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS FAM_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'RelationalTypeCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS DEGREE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS DEGREE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'DegreeCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS EDU_HIS_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS EDU_HIS_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'EduHisCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS RETURN_TYPE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS RETURN_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'ReturnTypeCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS CURRENCY_UNIT_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS CURRENCY_UNIT_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'CurrencyUnitCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS CONTRACT_TYPE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS CONTRACT_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'ContractTypeCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO
SELECT T.CONTENT FROM SY_PARAMETER T WHERE T.PARAMETER_ID = #PARAMETER_ID#

SELECT T.TYPE_ID DATE_TYPE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.TYPE_EN_NAME, T.TYPE_NAME) ELSE T.TYPE_NAME END) AS DATE_TYPE_NAME FROM AR_CALENDER_TYPE T WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#

SELECT T.ITEM_NO, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.ITEM_EN_NAME, T.ITEM_NAME) ELSE T.ITEM_NAME END) AS ITEM_NAME FROM AR_ITEM T, HR_COMPANY A WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = A.CPNY_ID(+) AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
ORDER BY T.ITEM_NO

SELECT T.DISTINCT_FIELD ITEM_ID, 'STA_ITEM.'||T.DISTINCT_FIELD ITEM_ID_F, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.FIELD_EN_NAME, T.FIELD_NAME) ELSE T.FIELD_NAME END) AS ITEM_NAME_F, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.FIELD_EN_NAME, T.FIELD_NAME) ELSE T.FIELD_NAME END) AS ITEM_NAME FROM PA_DISTINCT_LIST T, HR_COMPANY A WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = A.CPNY_ID(+) AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
T.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME#
ORDER BY T.ID

SELECT T.DISTINCT_FIELD MC_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.FIELD_EN_NAME, T.FIELD_NAME) ELSE T.FIELD_NAME END) AS MC_NAME FROM PA_DISTINCT_LIST T, HR_COMPANY A WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = A.CPNY_ID(+) AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
T.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME#
ORDER BY T.DISTINCT_FIELD

SELECT T.DISTINCT_FIELD MC_1ST_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.FIELD_EN_NAME, T.FIELD_NAME) ELSE T.FIELD_NAME END) AS MC_1ST_NAME FROM PA_DISTINCT_LIST T, HR_COMPANY A WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = A.CPNY_ID(+) AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
T.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME#
ORDER BY T.DISTINCT_FIELD

SELECT (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.FIELD_EN_NAME, T.FIELD_NAME) ELSE T.FIELD_NAME END) AS MC_NAME FROM PA_DISTINCT_LIST T, HR_COMPANY A WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = A.CPNY_ID(+) AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
T.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME#
T.DISTINCT_FIELD = #MC_CODE#

SELECT T.DISTINCT_FIELD MC_2ND_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.FIELD_EN_NAME, T.FIELD_NAME) ELSE T.FIELD_NAME END) AS MC_2ND_NAME FROM PA_DISTINCT_LIST T, HR_COMPANY A WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = A.CPNY_ID(+) AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
T.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME#
ORDER BY T.DISTINCT_FIELD

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS PARAM_TYPE_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS PARAM_TYPE_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'ParamItemTypeCode' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS UNIT_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS UNIT_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'ItemUnit' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.CODE_ID AS CARD_REASON_CODE, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' THEN IFNULL(T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) ELSE T.CODE_NAME END) AS CARD_REASON_NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'cardtimeReason' AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 ORDER BY T.ORDERNO
SELECT TO_CHAR(AR_GET_STARTDATE(AR_GET_MONTHSTR(#strDate#)),#timeFormat#) FROM DUAL
SELECT TO_CHAR(AR_GET_ENDDATE(AR_GET_MONTHSTR(#strDate#)),#timeFormat#) FROM DUAL

SELECT T.CODE_ID ID, if(#language#= 'en', T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) NAME, T.PARENT_CODE PARENT_ID FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = #areaId# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = 'wooribank' ORDER BY T.ORDERNO
SELECT T.CODE_ID ID, IF(#language#= 'en', T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'CustActionStateCode' AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# ORDER BY T.ORDERNO
SELECT T.CODE_ID ID, IF(#language#= 'en', T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'CustActionWayCode' AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# ORDER BY T.ORDERNO
SELECT T.CODE_ID ID, IF(#language#='en', T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'PurchaseTendCode' AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# ORDER BY T.ORDERNO
SELECT T.CODE_ID ID, IF(#language#= 'en', T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'AnnouncementTypeCode' AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# ORDER BY T.ORDERNO
SELECT T.CODE_ID ID, IF(#language#= 'en', T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'WorkAreaCode' AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# ORDER BY T.ORDERNO
SELECT T.CODE_ID ID, IF(#language# = 'en', T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = 'SalaryReferenceCode' AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# ORDER BY T.ORDERNO
SELECT T.SCREEN_GRANT_ID SCREEN_GRANT_ID FROM SY_ADMIN T WHERE T.ADMINID = #ADMINID# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1
SELECT T.CODE_ID ID, IF(#language#= 'en', T.CODE_EN_NAME, T.CODE_NAME) NAME FROM SY_CODE T WHERE T.PARENT_CODE = #PARENT_CODE# AND T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT PROD_NO, PRO_NAME||'_'||DRAWING_NO PROD_DETAIL FROM ( SELECT T.PROD_NO PROD_NO, T.PROD_ID PROD_ID, T.DRAWING_NO DRAWING_NO, IF(#language#= 'en', EP.PRO_EN_NAME, EP.PRO_NAME) PRO_NAME FROM ESS_PRODUCTION_ORDER T, ESS_PROJECT EP WHERE T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND EP.PRO_NO = T.PRO_NO(+) AND EP.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.ACTIVITY = 1)
SELECT ORDER_ID, ORDER_NAME FROM SY_ORDER WHERE CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#

SELECT CODE_ID, (CASE WHEN #language# = 'en' then CODE_EN_NAME ELSE CODE_NAME END) AS CODE_NAME FROM SY_CODE WHERE ACTIVITY = 1 AND PARENT_CODE = 'PaymentMode' AND CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# ORDER BY NLSSORT(IF(#language# = 'en', CODE_NAME, CODE_EN_NAME), 'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')
